channel.title: kubectl - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in kubectl on Today I Learnt...

item.title: That you can use kubectl to view/patch ArgoCD running parameters
item.description: ArgoCD exposes its own set of K8s custom resources when installed on a cluster:

item.title: How to include AWS-specific info when using kubectl get nodes
item.description: The standard configuration when using kubectl get nodes is meant to be working for any cluster, therefore does not include any specific information about the K8s distribution you are using.
